permissions.dashboardPermissionSystemDescription: This example shows how different dashboard sections are protected by permissions. Sections will only be visible if the user has the required role and permissions.

permissions.equipmentDescription: This section is visible because you have Equipment read permission.
permissions.financialDescription: This section is visible because you have Payroll read permission.

permissions.projectOverviewDescription: This section is visible because you have Project read permission.
permissions.quickActionsDescription: This section is visible because you have Settings read permission.
